tool_description: Creates searchable indexes of file content supporting multiple file formats and content types for fast retrieval.

file_paths.description: Array of file paths to index

supported_formats.description: File formats to index (txt, pdf, doc, docx, html, xml, json, csv)

max_file_size_mb.description: Maximum file size to index in megabytes

extract_metadata.description: Whether to extract and index file metadata

language.description: Content language for text processing (en, es, fr, de, etc.)

error_messages: Unsupported file format: One or more files have formats not included in supported_formats. Add the format or filter files.
File too large: File exceeds max_file_size_mb limit. Increase limit or exclude large files.
Index creation failed: Unable to create index with specified name. Ensure index name is unique and valid.
Content extraction error: Failed to extract text content from file. Verify file is not corrupted.
Insufficient disk space: Not enough storage available for index creation. Free up disk space.
Invalid language code: Language parameter must be a valid ISO 639-1 language code.
usage: Provide file paths and index name. Optionally specify supported formats, size limits, and language. The tool creates a searchable content index.

index_id.description: Unique identifier for the created index

total_documents.description: Total number of searchable documents in index

index_size_mb.description: Size of the created index in megabytes

failed_files.description: Array of file paths that failed indexing
